message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at $150. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $150 represents the value of the item, I'm willing to come down to $130 for you. I believe this is a fair price considering its quality and features.
I appreciate you coming down to $130, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
